oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: It Pays To Be Ignorant - 1946-08-23 - Part 4 // Waltz Time - 1946-08-23 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: CBS radio program It Pays To Be Ignorant, as broadcast August 23, 1946 (part 4) by station WHIO (Dayton, OH). Featuring announcer Ken Roberts; host Tom Howard; cast members Harry McNaughton, Lulu McConnell, and George Shelton; and musicians Harry Salter and the Philip Morris Orchestra, and Ray Porter's Esquires. Recording ends with the opening of radio program Waltz Time, featuring a performance by Evelyn MacGregor.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Evelyn MacGregor
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Cast talk [continued from part 3] -- Closing statement (Ken Roberts) -- Closing statement (Tom Howard) -- Station announcement -- Waltz Time excerpt
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: CBS Inc.; It pays to be ignorant (Radio program); Howard, Tom, 1885 or 1886-1955; McNaughton, Harry; McConnell, Lulu; Shelton, George; Roberts, Ken (Radio announcer); Salter, Harry, 1899-1984; Philip Morris Orchestra; WHIO (Radio station : Dayton, Ohio); MacGregor, Evelyn
